Text: Can't edit torrent description. You can call this episode 4x06 because Star Trek New Voyages/Phase 2 call this a continuation of the original series which ended in 3 seasons. So they call this season 4.

please do not change your naming conventions, while I would have omited seasons entirely 1x6 is more accurate than 4x6 because despite the chronology this is NOT TOS 

also, thanks for your uploads of these
